pcs_sub_heading: Would you like to join this conversation?
matching_state_searching_trans: We are currently looking for a new conversation partner for you
matching_state_found_unconfirmed_trans: We found a conversation partner for you
cp_searching_text: We are currently looking for a new conversation partner for you
chat_suggest_appointment_description: Select an appintment here and you can send it via chat message
chat_search_running_text: we will notify you once successful.
chat_appointment_message_overlap_header: Here {{ userName }} and you have time:
chat_appointment_message_non_overlap_hea: Here {{ userName }} is available but you are not:
chat_appointment_message_overlap: Hi {{ userName }}, ich habe gesehen wir haben beide am {{ date }} zeit, sollen wir und dann für einen Video call verabreden?
chat_appointment_message_non_overlap: Hi {{ userName }}, ich habe gesehen du hast am {{ date }} zeit, sollen wir und dann für einen Video call verabreden?
chat_success_message: Congratulations, you have a new request! {{userName}} would like to learn German with you. You can view the profile at the top left.
profile_topics: What topics would you like to talk about?
profile_expectations: Which languages do you speak and how well?

request_errors.fe_mismatch: Input values do not match. Please try again.
request_errors.to_long_5: Please enter a maximum of 5 characters.
request_errors.to_long_300: Please enter a maximum of 300 characters.
request_errors.value_not_in_range_trans: Please enter a valid birth year.
request_errors.phone_number_not_numeric: Your phone number contains disallowed characters.
request_errors.phone_number_too_short: Your phone number seems to be too short.
request_errors.password_contraints_not_met: Password too weak. Please use a minimum of 8 characters including at least one special character and one number.
request_errors.not_enough_interests: Please select at least one interest.
request_errors.email_format_wrong_trans: Please enter a valid e-mail address.
request_errors.password_to_short: The password must be at least 8 characters.
request_errors.password_missmatch: The passwords you entered don't match.
request_errors.birth_year_empty_trans: Please enter your year of birth.
request_errors.phone_number_empty: If you want to be notified by sms or phone, please enter your mobile number.
request_errors.password_to_common: This password is too common, please use a more secure password.
request_errors.length_not_in_constraint_trans_plz: Please enter a valid Post Code.
request_errors.name_contains_unallowed_characters: The name you have entered contains disallowed characters, e.g. spaces.

help_faqs_intro: Here you will find frequently asked questions. Maybe there is an answer to your question here too!
help_contact_intro_line1: The Little World Support Team is always available to answer any questions or problems you may have.
help_contact_intro_line2: We look forward to hearing from you and will try to help you as soon as possible.
help_contact_picture_label: Add pictures to explain the problem (optional)
help_contact_picture_drag: or drag and drop image here
ur_btn_unmatch_text: Not working out? Remove them from your matches.
ur_btn_report_text: Please tell us about your experience.
ur_confirm_unmatch_line1: Are you sure you want to unmatch with {{name}}?
ur_confirm_unmatch_line2: You will be unable to chat further.
ur_report_label: Tell us why you want to report {{name}}.
ur_reported_line2: They will no longer be able to contact you.
